q3d1hangar.author: Martinus
q3d1hangar.extract: A remake of the classic E1M1: Hangar from DooM, and anyone who might have seen Tabun's remake of Doom 2's MAP01 may find this as something similar. Geometric

dungeon_hunters_v2.author: Hand and Fingers
dungeon_hunters_v2.extract: A dark, tight, maze-like map consisting of the inside of an old stone keep. Connectivity is through the use of jump pads, teleporters and passageways. The download included the Alternate Fire 2.0 mod but you d

akutadm3.author: AKUTA
akutadm3.extract: Magnetic Centrifuge is a map with a futuristic tech atmosphere. There is a mixture of stock id Software textures and custom textures. Overall the map uses environment mapping shaders, so the map looks very shiny. There is no single dark spot, every area is

vq2dm2.author: V1979
vq2dm2.extract: Another conversion from V1979. This time it is the Quake 2 classic Tourney and DM map Tokay's Towers (q2dm2). Quake 3 Tourney, DM and Team DM game modes are supported. To be completely honest, this is one of the least interesting re-makes I've seen. The li

vq2dm1ctf.author: V1979
vq2dm1ctf.extract: A Quake 3 CTF version of the classic Quake 2 DM map The Edge (q2dm1). Team DM and DM game modes are also supported. The layout consist of two version of the map joined together at the outside area where the water to the Rail Gun is. The Flag is located on

vq3dm19ctf.author: V1979
vq3dm19ctf.extract: 4 slightly different remixed CTF versions of the Q3A original space DM level Apocalypse Void (q3dm19). The construction is solid, but then again there is not much to it. It is a direct copy of the original theme and textures except for the inclusion of red

vmpteam9.author: V1979
vmpteam9.extract: Here we have a nice looking and somewhat well played map. It is a remake of the classic Quake 3 map, The Very End of You (q3tourney6). The main difference from the original is the whole map is symmetrical. There are the two flag bases opposite from each ot

vmpteam6.author: V1979
vmpteam6.extract: A slightly remixed version of the Team Arena space map Vortex Portal (mpteam6) for standard Quake 3 game modes - DM, Team DM and CTF. The main difference from the original release is the removal of the worm hole tunnels. Interestingly this simple change al

vq3dm6ctf.author: V1979
vq3dm6ctf.extract: Take the id Software original map, The Camping Grounds (q3dm6) and duplicate it. Now join the two versions together. Repeat these actions but join the maps in a different way until you have four combinations. Change the entities and make the maps CTF. This

vq3dm7ctf.author: V1979
vq3dm7ctf.extract: This release is consists of two maps, both a CTF redux of Temple of Retribution (q3dm7). These two maps share a lot of the original, but the first version is larger and is a more complete copy than the second. Although the author has added support for FFA

map-tlq3dm1.author: Truthful Liar
map-tlq3dm1.extract: TLQ3Dm1 - Blood, Sweat, and Frags is quite a nice map considering it is the author's first. Using the Gothic set of id Software's original Quake 3 Arena textures, this map looks pretty good. Geometry is, in general, good, but take particular note of the ex

bloodcovenant.author: Max Zim, sst13, ShiN0
bloodcovenant.extract: Blood Covenant is a remake of the Quake Champions release of the same name, which is a remake of the Q3A original The Camping Grounds (Q3DM6). A neat new set of textures, architecture and a more fun layout

tig_gng.author: Tigger-oN
tig_gng.extract: A re-work of the Capcom classic Ghosts 'n Goblins introduction area. Originally released in 1985. Started as an April Fools' Day joke map but evo

obs3dm3v2.author: Obsessed
obs3dm3v2.extract: This is for all intents and purposes a reskin and some very sutble structural changes of the second ztn map that Obsessed bought us, the first being his own re-imagining of Blood Run. That being said, it would be a mis-carriage of jus

dk_p.author: dONKEY
dk_p.extract: According to the read me file, dONKEY lost all his work due to a hard drive failure, hence the title of this work: A Phuking Phoenix, which has risen from the ashes to find its way here on ..::LvL. The author has achieved the perfect balance between looks

dk_cockblocked.author: dONKEY
dk_cockblocked.extract: Set in ancient tropical ruins, Cock Blocked is a small rail map designed for 1 on 1. The level consists of two atrium's: one housing red armour and the other a mega health. In the area with the red armour sits a teleporter that will spawn you in various lo

bluestars.author: JonnYReds
bluestars.extract: A strong, dark stone brick and metal theme battle ground with a few surprises thrown in. The majority of this level works really well. Large open areas, tight corners and sub-level corridors that lead to surprise jumpapds make this level very interesting.

gothicspace_ctf.author: JonnYReds
gothicspace_ctf.extract: gothicspace_ctf is a very small Gothic textured space void CTF map bought to you by JonnYReds and originally released in 2001. The map is a symmetrical platform designed with jumppads between the two bases. In each base you will find a Rocket Launcher with

plokemedoy.author: JonnYReds
plokemedoy.extract: Haunted house or B-Grade horror like environment makes for a fun, fast DM. JonnYRed has a habit of making uniquely styled releases and this one is no exception. The mostly symmetrical layout is quick to learn and the central, higher area quickly becomes a

serious_wohnung.author: ZaRR
serious_wohnung.extract: A boxy house map that is based on an existing map released by Philer for Serious Sam: The Second Encounter.  Even so, what is found in this small map that was made in 8 hou

egyziana_2.author: JonnYReds
egyziana_2.extract: An Egyptian theme with contemporary elements in a mostly flat arena. The symmetrical central area is surround with a varying corridor that completes a loop. Bold brush work defines the theme and area. A few doors block direct line of sight around the centr

lvl-20-years.author: Various
lvl-20-years.extract: Quake 3 Arena and ..::LvL Q3A have been running now for 20 years. This pack covers 22 maps released over that time. After playing a short list of about 150 maps from the more than 2,300 that are currently listed on ..::LvL, one of the hardest things I have

includes.title: up close and personal by druzli
Lun3DM5 - You'll Shoot Your Eye Out

gooctf5.author: Gooball
gooctf5.extract: What we have here peeps is a little gem of a CTF map and a very solid release by Gooball. Decked out to a very high level in the rather excellent Evil Lair's texture set 8 we have a symmetrical base styled map. The archi
